Generation III.Ruby: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pok é mon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
Generation III.Sapphire: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pok é mon will also not forget the pain it endured.
Generation III.Emerald: To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly beneath large leaves and in the gaps of branches. It also attaches dead leaves to its body for camouflage.
Generation III.FireRed: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
Generation III.LeafGreen: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.

Generation IV.Diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
Generation IV.Pearl: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
Generation IV.Platinum: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
Generation IV.HeartGold: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.

Generation V.Black: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
Generation V.White: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
Generation V.Black 2: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
Generation V.White 2: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.

Generation VI.X: Its body, which is made of soft silk, hardens over time. When cracks appear, evolution is near.
Generation VI.Y: It never forgets any attack it endured while in the cocoon. After evolution, it seeks payback.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.

Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It is hot inside its cocoon. All the cells in its body create the energy for it to evolve.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Encased within its tough cocoon, it endures attacks. It never forgets the appearance of its foes.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: The silk coating its body is thin but sufficiently strong. Cascoon's silk has a luster and texture superior to that of Silcoon's, and clothes made using Cascoon silk are regarded as top-notch.

Generation IV.Pearl: Eterna Forest Routes 205 , 206 , 207 , 208 , 209 , 210 , 211 , 212 , 213 , 214 , 215 , 218 , 221 , 222 , Eterna Forest , Floaroma Meadow , Fuego Ironworks , Valley Windworks ( Honey Trees )

Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: Eterna Forest Routes 205 , 206 , 207 , 208 , 209 , 210 , 211 , 212 , 213 , 214 , 215 , 218 , 221 , 222 , Eterna Forest , Floaroma Meadow , Fuego Ironworks , Valley Windworks ( Honey Trees ) Grand Underground - Grassland Cave , Riverbank Cave , Still-Water Cavern , Sunlit Cavern
